channel.title: Cariboo Signals
channel.itunes:subtitle: Technology and society in rural BC with Riley and Casey
channel.itunes:author: Riley and Casey
channel.itunes:summary: How do rural communities grow alongside technology? Daily conversations about responsible tech progress in the Cariboo region on the traditional territories of the Secw√©pemc, T≈ùilhqot'in, and Dakelh nations. Riley brings tech systems thinking with rural roots, while Casey focuses on community development. New episodes every day with weekly themes.
channel.description: How do rural communities grow alongside technology? Daily conversations about responsible tech progress in the Cariboo region on the traditional territories of the Secw√©pemc, T≈ùilhqot'in, and Dakelh nations.
